abstract: Novartis has obtained the rights to an anticlotting drug that could eventually compete with Plavix, the world’s second-best-selling medicine.
snippet: Novartis has obtained the rights to an anticlotting drug that could eventually compete with Plavix, the world’s second-best-selling medicine.
lead_paragraph: Novartis has obtained the worldwide rights to an anticlotting drug that could eventually compete with Plavix, the world’s second-best-selling medicine behind the cholesterol pill Lipitor.

headline.main: Novartis Buys Rights to a Drug to Thin Blood
headline.print_headline: Novartis Buys Rights To a Drug To Thin Blood
